_comment: FILE: content/gallery.json - List of images available in the chat gallery picker. Add image entries here to make them selectable in the chat. Each image needs a filename (in files/gallery/) and an optional label. Use 'specialReplies' to define automatic responses when this image is sent to specific contacts (use contact ID as key).

specialReplies.contact-1: Tim! Jetzt hauts mer denn de Nuggi use. Wieso r체ehrsch du de Quitschi ins WC?!
Was schicksch mer das Foti? Das isch doch bereits im Fallverwaltigssystem abgleggt.
Tim du muesch mir nid so Z체g schicke. Leggs eifach im Fall ab.
Ich has dir doch gester erkl채rt. Genau f체r so Sache isch euses interne System...
